channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国商务部将制裁五家美国制造商对台军售
item.description: China will sanction five U.S. military manufacturers in response to the latest round of U.S. arms sales to Taiwan, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Sunday.翻译:外交部发言人周日表示，中国将制裁五家美国军工制造商，以回应美国最新一轮对台军售。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 缅甸叛军控制了中国边境附近的重要城镇
item.description: A Myanmar rebel alliance has gained control of a key town along the country's volatile northern border with China after weeks of fierce fighting with junta troops, the alliance and the junta said.翻译:缅甸反叛联盟和军政府表示，经过与军政府军队数周的激烈战斗，缅甸反叛联盟已控制了该国与中国北部边境的一个重要城镇。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国制定国有资本预算指导方针
item.description: China's State Council issued guidelines on improving an operating budget system for state-owned capital, according to a statement on the government website on Saturday.翻译:据政府网站周六发布的一份声明，中国国务院发布了关于完善国有资本经营预算制度的指导意见。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾猛烈抨击中国气球，称其为安全威胁、心理战
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry accused China on Saturday of threatening aviation safety and waging psychological warfare on the island's people with a recent spate of balloons spotted near or over the island, days before key Taiwanese elections.翻译:台湾国防部周六指责中国威胁航空安全，并对台湾民众发动心理战，在台湾重要选举前几天，最近在台湾附近或上空发现了一系列气球。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 缅甸叛军声称控制了中国边境附近的重要城镇
item.description: A Myanmar rebel alliance group has gained control of a key town along the country's volatile northern border with China after weeks of fierce fighting with junta troops, it said in a statement late on Friday.翻译:缅甸叛军联盟在周五晚些时候的一份声明中表示，经过与军政府部队数周的激烈战斗，缅甸叛军联盟已经控制了该国与中国北部边境的一个重要城镇。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北京称马尔代夫总统将于1月8日至12日访华
item.description: The president of the Maldives, Mohamed Muizzu, will pay a state visit to China from Jan. 8 to 12, the Chinese foreign ministry said in statement on Friday, in what would be a high-profile snub to the island nation's huge neighbour India.翻译:中国外交部周五在声明中表示，马尔代夫总统穆罕默德·穆伊祖将于 1 月 8 日至 12 日对中国进行国事访问，这将是对该岛国巨大邻国印度的高调冷落。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 王毅：中美合作“不再是一种选择……而是势在必行”
item.description: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Friday the most urgent task for Sino-U.S. relations is to establish a correct understanding and cooperation between the two sides, stressing it is "no longer an option ... but an imperative" for the world.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周五表示，中美关系最紧迫的任务是双方建立正确的理解与合作，并强调这对世界“不再是一种选择……而是势在必行”。
item.author: Liz Lee, Ethan Wang

item.title: 中国财富管理公司中植申请破产清算
item.description: Chinese wealth manager Zhongzhi Enterprise Group has filed for bankruptcy liquidation after failing to repay debt, as the firm grapples with a deepening property market downturn.翻译:中国财富管理公司中植企业集团因未能偿还债务而申请破产清算，该公司正努力应对房地产市场日益低迷的局面。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 童话般的冰雕吸引大批游客来到中国哈尔滨
item.description: China's annual Ice and Snow Festival, with its fairy-tale ice sculptures, opened on Friday attracting throngs of tourists who shuffled carefully over the slippy ice and snow and dragged their children in sledges around the park.翻译:中国一年一度的冰雪节周五开幕，童话般的冰雕吸引了大批游客，他们小心翼翼地在光滑的冰雪上拖行，拖着孩子乘坐雪橇在公园里转悠。
item.author: Nicoco Chan, Liz Lee

item.title: 赛默飞停止在西藏销售法医技术
item.description: Thermo Fisher Scientific has pledged to stop selling forensic technology and equipment in Tibet that could be used for identifying individuals, a spokesperson for the company said.翻译:赛默飞世尔科技发言人表示，该公司已承诺停止在西藏销售可用于识别个人身份的法医技术和设备。
item.author: Andrew Silver

item.title: 2024 年初台湾选举对美国稳定与中国关系的目标构成考验
item.description: Taiwan's election next week poses challenges for Washington no matter who wins, with a victory for the ruling party sure to exacerbate tensions with China while an opposition triumph may raise awkward questions about the island's defense policies.翻译:台湾下周的选举无论谁获胜都会给华盛顿带来挑战，执政党的胜利肯定会加剧与中国的紧张关系，而反对派的胜利可能会引发有关台湾国防政策的尴尬问题。
item.author: Michael Martina, David Brunnstrom

item.title: 议员要求五角大楼考虑禁止美国投资中国移远通信
item.description: The top Republican and Democrat on the U.S. House of Representatives' China committee on Thursday asked the Biden administration to consider adding China's Quectel Wireless to a list of Chinese military companies.翻译:美国众议院中国委员会共和党和民主党最高领导人周四要求拜登政府考虑将中国移远无线公司列入中国军工企业名单。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 香港大亨律师就证人酷刑指控向联合国提出上诉
item.description: Lawyers for Hong Kong pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai said on Thursday they had appealed to the United Nations expert on torture over the treatment of a witness they believe was tortured before giving incriminating evidence.翻译:香港民主大亨黎智英的律师周四表示，他们已就一名证人在提供定罪证据之前受到酷刑的待遇问题向联合国酷刑问题专家提出上诉。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 经过一年的事故和灾害，中国将解决安全风险
item.description: China said on Thursday it plans a three-year campaign to tackle problems hampering response times during disasters and accidents including production safety lapses in sectors like mining.翻译:中国周四表示，计划开展为期三年的行动，以解决灾害和事故中影响反应速度的问题，包括采矿等行业的生产安全失误。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国“冰城”哈尔滨元旦假期游客量创历史新高
item.description: The "ice city" of Harbin, the snowy capital of northeast China's Heilongjiang province, attracted a record number of visitors over the New Year holiday, many of them drawn by the grand and intricate ice sculptures of its annual Ice and Snow Festival.翻译:中国东北黑龙江省的冰雪之都哈尔滨的“冰城”在新年假期吸引了创纪录的游客数量，其中许多人被一年一度的冰雪节宏伟而复杂的冰雕所吸引。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国习近平就“恐怖袭击”向伊朗总统表示慰问
item.description: China's President Xi Jinping sent a message of condolence to the Iranian president on Thursday for the "terrorist attack" a day earlier, Chinese state television CCTV said.翻译:中国国家电视台中央电视台称，中国国家主席习近平周四就一天前发生的“恐怖袭击”向伊朗总统致唁电。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 预计到 2024 年底，中国国际航班数量将达到新冠肺炎疫情前水平的 80%
item.description: China's aviation regulator said on Thursday it expects the number of international flights to and from the country to reach 6,000 per week by the end of this year, or about 80% of pre-COVID levels.翻译:中国航空监管机构周四表示，预计到今年年底，每周往返中国的国际航班数量将达到每周 6,000 架次，约为疫情前水平的 80%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 流弹造成五人受伤 中国向缅甸提出抗议
item.description: China has protested to Myanmar over five people injured after artillery shells lobbed during battles between its ruling junta and rebel groups strayed into a small town near their border, a foreign ministry spokesperson said on Thursday.翻译:外交部发言人周四表示，中国已就缅甸执政军政府与叛乱组织之间的战斗中炮弹误入边境附近一座小镇造成五人受伤一事向缅甸提出抗议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国12月服务业活动增速为5个月来最快
item.description: China's services activity expanded at the fastest pace in five months thanks to a solid rise in new business, a private-sector survey showed on Thursday, lifting the degree of optimism in the sector to a three-month high.翻译:周四的一项私营部门调查显示，由于新业务的强劲增长，中国服务业活动以五个月来最快的速度扩张，将该行业的乐观程度提升至三个月高点。
item.author: Reuters
